title: Amazon PPC Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a highly motivated Amazon PPC Specialist to join our growing e-commerce team. You will be responsible for managing, optimizing, and scaling Amazon advertising campaigns using tools like Helium 10, Scale Insights, and Amazon Brand Analytics. You’ll work closely with leadership to improve campaign structure, control spend, and drive profitable growth.

You must be available to work during U.S. Eastern Time (EST) business hours.

The ideal candidate is data-driven, proactive, and communicates clearly. You should be comfortable taking ownership of campaign performance and following SOPs while still thinking critically and offering suggestions to improve strategy.

Responsibilities:

Create and manage Sponsored Product, Sponsored Brand, and Sponsored Display campaigns

Optimize keywords, bids, placements, and budgets to improve performance

Monitor ACOS, TACOS, and other key KPIs and make strategic adjustments

Use Helium 10, Brand Analytics, and Scale Insights for keyword research and competitive analysis

Identify underperforming areas and take initiative to fix them

Communicate progress and blockers clearly with the team
